statements: SELECT * FROM BookEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM BookEvents;
SELECT event_location, event_type FROM BookEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM BookEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM BookEvents WHERE event_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT * FROM BookEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM BookEvents WHERE event_location = 'Library' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM BookEvents WHERE event_type = 'Conference' AND event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM BookEvents ORDER BY event_type;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM BookEvents WHERE event_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY event_name ASC, event_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM BookEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM BookEvents WHERE event_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM BookEvents ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BookEvents WHERE event_type = 'Conference' AND event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_role FROM EventParticipants JOIN BookEvents ON EventParticipants.event_id = BookEvents.event_id WHERE event_name = 'Book Launch';
SELECT * FROM BookEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM BookEvents WHERE event_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM EventParticipants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM EventParticipants WHERE participant_role = 'Author';
SELECT event_name, count(*) AS total_participants FROM BookEvents JOIN EventParticipants ON BookEvents.event_id = EventParticipants.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT * FROM BookFairs;
SELECT EventID, EventName, Location FROM AuthorSignings WHERE EventDate >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT EventName, EventDate FROM BookLaunches WHERE Location = 'New York';
SELECT EventName, BookTitle FROM BookLaunches WHERE EventDate <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT EventName, AuthorName, Location FROM AuthorSignings WHERE AuthorName = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM BookFairs WHERE EventDate > '2022-01-01';
SELECT EventName, Location FROM AuthorSignings WHERE AuthorName = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT EventID, EventName, EventDate, Location, Organizer FROM BookFairs ORDER BY EventDate DESC;
SELECT EventName, BookTitle FROM BookLaunches WHERE EventDate < '2022-06-01';
SELECT COUNT(EventID) AS TotalEvents FROM AuthorSignings WHERE Location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM BookEvent;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM BookEvent WHERE event_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT location, organizer FROM BookFair ORDER BY fair_date DESC;
SELECT launch_id, book_title, organizer FROM BookLaunch WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT signing_id, author_name, location FROM AuthorSigning ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM BookEvent;
SELECT * FROM AuthorSigning WHERE signing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, organizer FROM BookEvent WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT launch_id, book_title, organizer FROM BookLaunch ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT fair_name, fair_date, organizer FROM BookFair WHERE fair_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY fair_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BookFairs WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM AuthorSignings ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT book_title FROM BookLaunches WHERE event_location = 'London';
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE participant_type = 'Author' AND event_id = 3;
SELECT organizer_name, event_name FROM EventOrganizers JOIN BookFairs ON EventOrganizers.event_id = BookFairs.event_id;
SELECT * FROM BookFairs
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM BookFairs
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM BookFairs WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT author_name, event_date FROM AuthorSignings ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT book_title, event_location FROM BookLaunches WHERE event_location LIKE '%New%'
